characters.name: ANNA
characters.description: Väike inimene, rõõmsameelne tüdruk, heledate blondide juustega. Tavaliselt kannab roosat paksu talvemantlit, roosasid kindaid ja roosat mütsi. Suured uudishimulikud silmad ja sõbralik naeratav näoilme. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: ELI
characters.description: Väike inimene, uudishimulik tüdruk, lühikeste pruunide juustega. Tavaliselt kannab sinist paksu talvemantlit, siniseid kindaid ja sinist mütsi. Suured rõõmsameelsed silmad ja sõbralik naeratav näoilme. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: Köök
locations.description: Cozy children's kitchen with light yellow walls, light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

locations.name: Aed
locations.description: Peaceful snowy winter garden with a thick blanket of white snow covering the ground. Bare tree branches with a few red berries visible in the background. A simple wooden fence defines the garden perimeter. Crisp, bright winter sunlight. Cartoon style.

pages.scene: Anna and Eli are sitting on the wooden floor in the cozy kitchen, playing with colorful building blocks. Anna wears a yellow long-sleeved shirt and blue pants. Eli wears a green long-sleeved shirt and red pants. The kitchen has light yellow walls, a light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

Anna and Eli are still sitting on the wooden floor in the cozy kitchen. Anna (in yellow shirt and blue pants) looks at Eli (in green shirt and red pants) with a thoughtful expression, and Eli points excitedly towards the window. The kitchen has light yellow walls, a light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

Anna (in yellow shirt and blue pants) stands next to the kitchen counter, holding a clear glass pitcher filled with water. Eli (in green shirt and red pants) stands next to her, holding a small empty blue mixing bowl. The kitchen has light yellow walls, a light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

Anna (in yellow shirt and blue pants) carefully pours water from the pitcher into the small blue mixing bowl, which Eli (in green shirt and red pants) holds steady on the kitchen table. The kitchen has light yellow walls, a light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

Eli (in green shirt and red pants) carefully drops a few colorful red berries into the water in the blue mixing bowl, which sits on the kitchen table. Anna (in yellow shirt and blue pants) watches with a smile. The kitchen has light yellow walls, a light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

Anna (now wearing a pink thick winter coat, pink mittens, and a pink hat) and Eli (now wearing a blue thick winter coat, blue mittens, and a blue hat) are standing excitedly by the kitchen door, ready to go outside. The kitchen has light yellow walls, a light wooden floor, a single window on the back wall showing snowy trees outside. A small wooden table and two small chairs are in the center. A simple counter with a sink on the left wall. Warm, soft light from the window. Cartoon style.

Anna (in pink winter coat, mittens, hat) and Eli (in blue winter coat, mittens, hat) are stepping out of a backdoor into the snowy winter garden, holding the blue bowl with water and berries between them. The garden has a thick blanket of white snow covering the ground. Bare tree branches with a few red berries visible in the background. A simple wooden fence defines the garden perimeter. Crisp, bright winter sunlight. Cartoon style.

Anna (in pink winter coat, mittens, hat) and Eli (in blue winter coat, mittens, hat) are carefully placing the blue mixing bowl, containing water and red berries, into a patch of soft, fresh snow in the garden. They are kneeling slightly. The garden has a thick blanket of white snow covering the ground. Bare tree branches with a few red berries visible in the background. A simple wooden fence defines the garden perimeter. Crisp, bright winter sunlight. Cartoon style.

The blue mixing bowl sits in a patch of soft snow in the garden. The surface of the water in the bowl has clearly frozen into a layer of clear ice, with the red berries trapped inside. Anna and Eli (in their winter coats, mittens, hats) are standing near it, observing with curious expressions. The garden has a thick blanket of white snow covering the ground. Bare tree branches with a few red berries visible in the background. A simple wooden fence defines the garden perimeter. Crisp, bright winter sunlight. Cartoon style.

The blue mixing bowl with the beautiful, clear ice and red berries is sparkling brightly in the crisp winter sunlight in the snowy garden. The ice is fully formed and reflects the sun. Anna and Eli (in their winter coats, mittens, hats) are standing nearby, pointing at the ice bowl, smiling happily and admiring their creation. The garden has a thick blanket of white snow covering the ground. Bare tree branches with a few red berries visible in the background. A simple wooden fence defines the garden perimeter. Crisp, bright winter sunlight. Cartoon style.
